import React from 'react'; export const Lessons = () => { return (

My Lessons 📚

{/* Upcoming Lessons */}

{[1, 2].map((i) => (

Tomorrow, 10:00 AM • 60 minutes

))}
{/* Past Lessons */}

Past Lessons

{[1, 2, 3].map((i) => (

Spanish Grammar with Miguel

January {20 + i}, 2024 • 60 minutes

{i === 1 ? ( ) : (
⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐ Great lesson!
)}
))}
); }; export default Lessons;
